Package com.codingchili.core.listener

Interface Session

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable, Messageable, java.io.Serializable, io.vertx.core.shareddata.Shareable, Storable
    public interface Session
extends Messageable, Storable
    Indicates that a request is part of a persistent connection. This means that services can write to the session without using request-reply messaging.

    • Field Summary
